thread.title: Amazon stock up as the company reaches 100 mln Prime subscribers

title: Amazon stock up as the company reaches 100 mln Prime subscribers
text:
Amazon stock up as the company reaches 100 mln Prime subscribers 2:37am IST - 01:44 
Amazon's Chief Executive officer Jeff Bezos told shareholders the internet giant now has more than 100 million Amazon Prime members globally. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Amazon's Chief Executive officer Jeff Bezos told shareholders the internet giant now has more than 100 million Amazon Prime members globally. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
